lead_paragraph: Dr. David H. Newman, accused of groping patients in an emergency room in Manhattan, was a prominent advocate of health care reform.

byline.contributor: James C. McKinley Jr. and Benjamin Mueller contributed reporting, and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

snippet: Dr. David H. Newman, accused of groping patients in an emergency room in Manhattan, was a prominent advocate of health care reform.

headline.main: Colleagues Express Disbelief Over Arrest of Doctor With Picture-Perfect Life
headline.print_headline: Colleagues Express Disbelief Over Arrest of Doctor With a Picture-Perfect Life

abstract: Colleagues of Dr David H Newman, prominent emergency room physician at Mount Sinai Hospital in Manhattan and emerging expert in emergency care reform, express shock and disbelief at his arrest on charges of sexually abusing patients.
